message.jwnendportal.destroy_only_own_po: You can only destroy your own portal. (Portal owner: %s)
message.jwnendportal.remote_gateway_to_o: You must complete the 'Remote Getaway' advancement to open the portal.
message.jwnendportal.no_more_overworld: You can no longer place a portal in the Overworld. Please destroy your existing portal and try again.
message.jwnendportal.no_more_end: You can no longer place a portal in the End. Please destroy your existing portal and try again.
message.jwnendportal.cannot_place_nether: You cannot place a portal here.
